snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 426: Sonic Zero: Remastered (SAGE2009-2012)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic Zero: Remastered - SAGE2009-2012
Credit: MCKaosu, Sparks, LarkSS & Gamenerd Advance
Release Date: July 25th, 2009 (2009-2012)

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.
Max Stunner: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nw3Ix0ZAvjg

(SAGE2009)
00:00 - Boot&Stuff
00:12 - Character Select
00:54 - Palmtree Parkway Act 1
03:58 - Credits

(SAGE2010)
05:40 - Boot&Title (Beta)
06:05 - Character Select
06:19 - Palmtree Paradiso Act 1
08:42 - Boos&Title (V3 or SAGE)
09:06 - Character Select
09:19 - Generic Garden Act 1
12:59 - Generic Garden Act 2
16:04 - Generic Garden Act 3 & Boss
18:58 - Credits

(SAGE2011)
19:53 - Controls
20:10 - Boot&Title
20:30 - Selection Menu
20:41 - Generic Garden Act 1
23:05 - Generic Garden Act 2
25:17 - Generic Garden Act 3 & Boss
26:59 - Credits

(SAGE2012)
27:29 - Boot&Title
28:28 - Character Select
28:54 - Tidal Tubes Zone Hub Brief
29:25 - Tidal Tubes Zone Demo
37:46 - Tidal Sewer Zone ???
43:14 - Palmtree Parkway Zone Race
45:46 - Credits
46:18 - Tidal Tubes Zone Hub Explore
49:00 - Game Over

NOTES: OKAY, we now return from the future back into the past where Sonic is no longer Old and crazy.
And still adventuring through various old fangames such as this one right here!
And this one just happens to be a "Remastered" game of the old Sonic Zero fangame made by Max Stunner.
So lets get do it...

2009 - Great Remixes, gameplay is fine, Tails is not playable, visually nice, all is great.

2010 - So it reverts to the more classic sprites which I think is a bit overused but sure I guess.
Here we have a new 3 Act Zone and a an actual boss, it's kind of hard to speak aobout this one.
It's fully playable just fine but nothing too special.

2011 - Despite the title not being updated this is the 2011 build with custom controls.
Same levels as 2010 tho slightly tweaked and maybe the music as well minor tweaks.

2012 - Now this one has a lot of Remixed music tracks that I think are fantastic.
Title, the Tidal levels, which are all Remastered Remixes of an old tune which I love.
Gameplay varies from a normal level to Racing and Badnik hunting, pretty solid for the most part.
Amy just seems to have an identidy crisis during some sprite animation moments but oh well!
Overall pretty nice this one even tho it has been cancelled.

Side Note: This video is not recorded in 60FPS so the shield visuals look wrong.

(ISSUES)

1. 2009's Music does not Loop.
2. 2011-2012 Can't change controls. (Move or Delete the file in Profile Folder and try again)
